title: Some friendships/rivalries make no sense anymore
body: For example, it says on the website that {{champion:77}} and {{champion:76}} are friends. Udyr has lived the majority of his life in the Freljord and the rest in Ionia. Nidalee has lived in the Kumungu Jungle since she was a baby. They live on *completely opposite sides of the continent.* How have they even met, let alone become friends!?

replies.body:
When Riot announced their retcon plan, I don't think either the Narrative or the supposed "Foundations" teams realized how much work that change actually meant for them.  Not only do they have to figure out champion bios but also friendships and rivalries and everything else.

Therefore, if this entire retcon takes less than six months from today (October 23, 2014), I would be shocked.
BTW, im not trying to be toxic or anything Terra, But where have u been?
The truth is she became a werewolf. Yep. It was either that or lose her love. I mean, he now has to live in another world. So, she's a teenager. Obviously she'd do it with little thought.
dude, wtf are you talking about
I have no idea. But its so crazy and weird it could work considering what Terra goes through.
Working.  I did have that "This isn't lore" thread yesterday, though.
Nah, it's a lil weird to not see the same people I saw in lore discussion....still haven't seen a word from secretlore

I've basically stopped caring about what Narrative does. The lore community just making up our own LoL lore, building upon the original foundations and adding in whatever we like from their new material, sounds better to me every day. Meanwhile, let Riot go off and make their "foundations" for some ridiculous media franchise, MMO, or whatever they're planning in some League-less alternate version of Runeterra.
Maybe they are dating via internet, lol

> Maybe they are dating via internet, lol

Ironically several champions were at one point. In the old JoJ Blitzcrank created a dating service that operated through the holo-net.

Also, all the champions you see that are friends, in a way that seems odd like the OP's example, met through the IoW. Meetings, matches, common beliefs, etc.
Well the IoW doesn't exist anymore.
I am 100% they will have to rework the whole landmass of Runeterra. All it is, is a huge circle with a few islands. Cities and 'exotic' locations dont make sense where they are.

> I am 100% they will have to rework the whole landmass of Runeterra. All it is, is a huge circle with a few islands. Cities and 'exotic' locations dont make sense where they are.

Yep...

The retcon costs them more time then to continue the old lore. it's a ridiculous and insane undertaking.


And I'm also wonder if this Foundations team even exists. Sounds like some stupid rumor.

Unless the New York Times lied its for real.

http://www.nytimes.com/2014/10/12/technology/riot-games-league-of-legends-main-attraction-esports.html?_r=0
I laughed at the "fan experience comes before profits" caption.
after the shurima event lore changes i stop reading lore it just makes me sad now
Riot is kinda bad at the whole consistent storytelling thing.

[I liked the possibility of Lee Sin being able to speak to Sona through Summoner magic :( ]
It's all gone.

> For example, it says on the website that {{champion:77}} and {{champion:76}} are friends. Udyr has lived the majority of his life in the Freljord and the rest in Ionia. Nidalee has lived in the Kumungu Jungle since she was a baby. They live on *completely opposite sides of the continent.* How have they even met, let alone become friends!?

http://i.imgur.com/Jtzt1Wq.jpg
Hell, a bunch of the friendships/rivalries didn't make sense in the first place. But yeah, even more of them are senseless now.
At least there was a logical explenation for them with the IoW. Now there's nothing.

Riot is going to have to change their theme songs name, or at least one of their most famous songs.
(Summoners Call)

They said it starts with

#Azir/Shurima.
ok then I guess we can't explain how Udyr and Nidalee know eachother now, but we can understand how they knew eachother before the retcon. Except apparently they aren't canon anyway.

See, it would work if they had left in the IoW, since they would have obviously met as champions.

But with the retcon? Yeah, it doesn't work.
Because the League of Legends is non-canon.  That's how they met.

in Lucian and Thresh rivaly thing only Thresh was Rival to lucian, Thresh had no Rivals and that makes sense he only enjoys torturing people and getting their souls but now Lucian is a Rival to thresh which I dont understand... sure Lucian wants to kill Thresh but im pretty sure Thresh's search for souls and enlightenment with torture would overlap any rivaly he would have to someone trying to get him... like a fly at the window or something

could be because Lucian is getting on his nerves.
{{champion:236}} "THRESH!This time you will not escape me"
{{champion:412}} "oh you again?Seriously don't you have any hobbies?"
{{champion:236}} "give me back my wife!"
{{champion:412}} "I told you a million times,I don't even remember who your wife is.I have so many souls in my lantern I can't remember each and every one of them"
{{champion:236}} "You don't even remember?You will pay for this"
{{champion:412}}  "uh not again,does this guy never give up? -.-"

On a serious note:
There is also the possibility that thresh simply wants to kill lucian because he wants to add him to his collection,you know it'd be just like completing a set for him to have senna and her boyfriend.
Alternatively he might see it as his job to punish the livings who cause a ruckus on the shadow isles.

I'm pretty sure that's only because Riot doesn't want one of their "main" rivalries to be a one-way thing. Who knows, maybe Thresh does have some personal grudge or something against Lucian? After all, he is intentionally still carrying his wife's soul around instead of taking it to the Shadow Isles.

> I'm pretty sure that's only because Riot doesn't want one of their "main" rivalries to be a one-way thing. Who knows, maybe Thresh does have some personal grudge or something against Lucian? After all, he is intentionally still carrying his wife's soul around instead of taking it to the Shadow Isles.

Yeh I feel yah but as someone who really loves Thresh having a enemy just dosen't feel right... with his personality he dosen't seem like a guy to hold a grudge, btw one theory is that Senna reminds Thresh of his own wife or something thats why he took her soul, and to OP their are a bunch of rivalries that seem werid to me

So would the name have to be replaced as well since summoners never existed in an institute that isn't real?  This whole retcon thing is a colossal mistake.  Literally almost everything needs to be redone and replaced now or it creates inconsistencies.
